content: Look, Reagan was a nice guy with a winning personality and some grand fanciful notions, but his real grasp of especially how the financial world worked was non-existent. Everything that those who surrounded him put into action made the rich richer and the poor poorer while allowing corporate crime and corporate gambling to rape the nation through legalized ponzi schemes and national debt that has our country on the brink of disaster right now... He managed to bluff the Soviet Union into financial collapse and disintegration, and he gave some credibility back to the arm services - and I thank him for both... But the financial nightmare we are in right now can be traced all the way back to "trickle-down economics" and deregulation that began on his watch, leading to the monopolies and bankster shysterism that is fleecing our country right to the bone - - Wandering and Wondering

content: Well, the Israelites wandered in the wilderness for forty years on a trip that should have taken two weeks. Guess it's human nature? Each generation is under the illusion that they invented the world. It's a rare child that truly listens to the elders.

Exactly!! Why should the twits pay attention when they know that it will keep coming back until it breaks them or until they decide to work towards a common good rather than the "I got mine, where's yours?". These are my opinions. Yours may differ.

title: Why don't people pay attention to the past??

content: We like reliving all the mistakes of the past because life would be so boring without depressions, wars, famine, plague, crime, etc etc etc.... What would commiewood have to make movies about if we had heaven on earth? Boring!! OF course, I'm being facetious. I taught history for many years, and the more I taught it, the more frustrating it was - because nobody really listens to it, and therefore doom themselves to all the failures, disasters and heart aches of the past, never leaving even a comma out. We are going, step by zombie step, through the events that led to the Great Depression and World War II - It is coming. . .! DAMN! Mankind is so STUPID! You know the story of Merlin and Arthur, and that Merlin finally left Arthur to his fated Doom. Why? Merlin could see the future, because he had been there, living backwards through time for 900 years. He could warn Arthur at every turn!! So why did he leave?? Merlin left because he HAD indeed seen the Future - and it was immutably unchangeable... He could warn Arthur all he wanted, but Arthur still had to march lock-step through the events. There can be NO prophecy unless the Future is set! All Merlin could do is frustrate himself, and puzzle Arthur by constantly trying to warn him. In fact, to some degree, Merlin would be DOOMING Arthur by warning him, because the warning itself may be locking the event into happening. So Merlin left out of useless frustration, with the hope Arthur might gain his own wisdom and survive, but it didn't happen - - I gave up teaching history for much the same reason - It's a waste of time. Mankind is Doomed to do the stupidity it will do! Has any of this made sense or sunk in? Probably not - Get out yer credit card, spend yourself into oblivion and have a good time, for as the cynical Roman Epicureans said at the time of Christ, "Eat, Drink, and be Merry; for tomorrow, we die!" And they and their Empire did - after letting the blood of millions - - Nothing has/will change - - enough . .. . Wandering and Wondering

content: "Those who cannot learn from history are doomed to repeat it." George Santayana Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!

title: Why don't people pay attention to the past??

content: A trap that was set and baited a number of years ago is payday loans. People struggling to make ends meet fall into the trap. The language in the contract covers the lender, "Always use payday loans responsibly", that is their out. They know a lot of people can't budget, so they spend more than they earn. I know people are to be responsible, NEVER SPEND MORE THAN YOU EARN. DO NOT USE CREDIT CARDS, UNLESS ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY! The lenders are getting fat off others misjudgement! It's in the news all the time, people are loosing their homes, cars, ect. because they can't pay for them. This is an example of people not paying attention to the past! Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!

content: Don't know why payday loans are even legal. They seem to have widespread acceptance as a pseudo money management tool. The government ought to shut them all down and force people to use their own brains to manage their money. I tell ya, borrowing money can be a spider web, you have to go with great caution. Seems like people nowadays use no horse sense whatsoever, they fall for anything, such as the payday loan advance crap. You don't get something for nothing! I wouldn't touch them with a ten foot pole. When I was a young lady, I never borrowed from anybody, not even from family members. It's hard, but it teaches you good self control. Never go looking for magic, the real world isn't like that. I think they ought to go back to the simple old fashioned mortgages they had when I bought my house.

content: 500% interest, with local government and politicians taking their cut. It was called "Benny the Loan Shark and Knuckles" back during the Depression... See what I told ya - same old sameold - Nothing new under the sun. The alley slime is just legitimate now - - Just knock on the door, and when the little slot opens, say "Joe sent me..." We got the Mafia running the country now - - Wandering and Wondering
